name: Interpersonal Frequency
description:
Founded in 2009 by Harish R. Rao, a data scientist and Webby Award winner, Interpersonal Frequency (I.F.) develops civic web platforms, custom online software, and tackles “big data” problems for some of the largest most forward-thinking civic institutions in the U.S.
As a data-driven company, we rely on a combination of primary research, including our Voice of Citizen analytics, and our staff's deep experience in the field to provide solutions that perfectly fit the needs of our clients.
READ MORE...
